channel.title: How to add a delay for picking flax? [508]
channel.description:
I can do this in 317's but not in 508's..
I just successfully implemented picking flax into my server, but I can mass it like super fast, and it gives me flax for nearly every click. How would I make it so that you have to wait like 5 seconds before picking another flax? I can't find this anywhere in my server files.

item.title: How to add a delay for picking flax? [508]
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“ar-temi-s, post:2, topic:283311”]Declare a Delay unless you already have one, then add in something like

delay = 5;

I tried using the food delay, but it didn’t work.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add a delay for picking flax? [508]

item.title: How to add a delay for picking flax? [508]

item.description:
@ar-temi-s wrote:

Declare a Delay unless you already have one, then add in something like
